name: Boxing (itch) (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5 (alpha) Details Title Boxing Model No. BX-301 Series Game & Watch (Micro Vs. System) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date July 31, 1984 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

A boxing game where each player must try to knock out their opponent.

Gameplay

Each player can punch high and low, or lean back to dodge a punch. Each boxer has an energy meter with up to 5 bars of energy. Every hit reduces a boxer's energy meter by one bar. A boxer is forced to take a step backwards when they have no more energy bars remaining. A boxer can be knocked down when they are forced to their side of the ring and hit until they have no more energy remaining.

There are 9 rounds with no knockdown limit. Each boxer has a stamina meter that starts at 50. Stamina points are lost when a boxer is punched, forced backwards or knocked down. The game ends when a boxer is knocked down with no stamina remaining, or by reaching the end of the 9th round.

Modes

Game A - Single player
Game B - Two player
